alert.note: Alert for Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 1:54PM CDT until June 16 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Strafford, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Strafford, Fordland, Turners and Northview. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 83 and 96. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
